org.megatome.frame2.front
Interface RequestProcessor

All Known Implementing Classes:
HttpRequestProcessor, SoapRequestProcessor
public interface RequestProcessor

The request processor is the delegate for use by servlets in processing HTTP requests.

Method Summary
 void postProcess()
          Called after the processRequest() method is called.
 void preProcess()
          Called before the processRequest() method is called.
 Object processRequest()
          Process the current request.
 void release()
          Release any references held by the RequestProcessor.
 

Method Detail

processRequest

Object processRequest()
                      throws Throwable
Process the current request.

Returns:
Always null. Reserved for future use.
Throws:
Throwable

release

void release()
Release any references held by the RequestProcessor.

preProcess

void preProcess()
Called before the processRequest() method is called. Custom request processors can override this to perform specific actions before a request begins to process.

postProcess

void postProcess()
Called after the processRequest() method is called. Custom request processors can override this to perform specific actions after a request has finished processing.
